name: Bastion of Iron Will
shortContent: Double your Psy Rating on opposed WP tests on Psyniscience skill tests or Psychic Powers.
content:
The character's sheer willpower and psychic focus have
become one and the same over years of practice and training,
such that their combined use is second nature. The character
doubles his Psy Rating on any Opposed Test involving the
Psyniscience Skill or Psychic Powers.
